sqlMap.select: select CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, SC_OP_ID, LOGIN_CODE, SC_JOB_ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_CLASS, JOB_LEVEL from CC_CUST_PROD_OP where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and CC_CUST_ID = #custId:DECIMAL# and SC_PRODUCT_ID = #productId:DECIMAL# and SC_OP_ID = #opId:DECIMAL#

select CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, SC_OP_ID, LOGIN_CODE, SC_JOB_ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_CLASS, JOB_LEVEL from CC_CUST_PROD_OP where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and CC_CUST_ID = #custId:DECIMAL# and SC_PRODUCT_ID = #productId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into CC_CUST_PROD_OP (CC_CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, SC_ORG_ID, SC_ORG_NAME, SC_PRODUCT_ID, PROD_NAME, SC_MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, SC_OP_ID, LOGIN_CODE, SC_JOB_ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_CLASS, JOB_LEVEL) values (#ccCustId:DECIMAL#, #custName:VARCHAR#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgName:VARCHAR#, #scProductId:DECIMAL#, #prodName:VARCHAR#, #scModuleId:DECIMAL#, #moduleName:VARCHAR#, #scOpId:DECIMAL#, #loginCode:VARCHAR#, #scJobId:DECIMAL#, #jobName:VARCHAR#, #jobClass:VARCHAR#, #jobLevel:VARCHAR#)
